meanings.definition: The innermost part of an organ or structure.
meanings.sent1: The medullas of the tree trunk contain essential nutrients for growth.
meanings.sent2: Doctors studied the medullas of the heart to understand its function better.
meanings.sent3: The chef carefully removed the medullas of the vegetable to prepare a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was the medullas of her personality, always shining through.
meanings.sent5: The medullas of the problem lay in miscommunication between the team members.

meanings.sent1: Injuries to the medullas can have serious consequences on mobility.
